knowledge from the spiritual source a

although the words were inspired
nevertheless they were written by men

manifesting through the inner

this desire leads one to the truth
through inspiration no call goes out
from any soul that is not answered from

eternally linked into the great Almighty
father
there is no distance between you and the

there is no separation between the
Spirit of God and each and every one of

and that spirit is a spirit of the

Scriptures have been written through

for the purpose of instruction in the

his love beyond comprehension and his

recognize it completely and by its peak
then the word you speak as power all
Power has been given unto me in heaven
and
earth there are no creations hidden from

therefore my words become the vehicle

who have already passed from the mortal

and through this consciousness the

you will know the Christ to be the only

raise your consciousness above the

have I not proved that the Son of God

father
through all life radiating light

consciously expressed divinity wherever

the word believe means a deep knowing

everything that has happened in your

spirit is consciousness and
consciousness acts on the substance by

the power to walk upon the water is

something strange to him he walked until
